about_the_game:
One winter night, you find a hunter in the woods: A man so warm and charming you feel as if you've known him all your life.

But appearances can be deceiving.

You'd know that well, wouldn't you?





Snow White Ashes is a dark fairy tale romance where hunter meets hunter–and beauty is only skin deep.

It features:

  • A rich, captivating story inspired by fairy tales and myths.
  • Choices that influence both the narrative and your relationship with your hunter.
  • Multiple endings: Good, bad and everything in-between.
  • Hand drawn artwork and CGs.
  • An original piano-based soundtrack.
  • One charming, not at all bloodthirsty love interest.
  • You, a perfectly innocent, guileless heroine with no hidden motives whatsoever.

Note: This game contains darker themes, especially around toxic/unhealthy relationships. Please visit my website if you need a detailed content warning breakdown.




Snow White Ashes is a solo project, with the art, music, story and programming created by ENDYSIS (me!) Thanks so much for checking out my game!

Special thank you: Calamanser, Thea, cobaye, Sammy L.

content_descriptors.notes: The full game will contain some suggestive scenes and non-explicit sexual content, as well as themes that may be upsetting to some players, including: Emotionally manipulative/abusive relationships, dubious consent, metaphorical substance abuse, mild body horror, blood and death.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
